thread.title_full: Hollyoaks teases huge 20th anniversary week in exciting new trailer - Hollyoaks News - Soaps - Digital Spy

author: Sophie Dainty
title: Hollyoaks teases huge 20th anniversary week in exciting new trailer - Hollyoaks Soaps -
text: Hollyoaks has unveiled an exciting new trailer previewing the show's upcoming 20th anniversary celebrations. The Channel 4 soap is celebrating its 20th milestone later this month with a huge week of episodes lined up to mark the occasion. Watch the trailer by hitting play below:The trailer features a storm at Hollyoaks Pride and hints at the dark events to come as several characters find themselves embroiled in the white water stunt danger.The anniversary is being teased with the strapline "20 years of Hollyoaks, One Killer Week", as the identity of the Gloved Hand Killer will also be revealed.A special boxset of classic episodes has been uploaded online to coincide with the 20th anniversaryHollyoaks is kicking of its unmissable week on Monday, October 19 on Channel 4.Digital Spy Soap Scoop video - hit play below for gossip on Ian and Kathy's EastEnders reunion, Sally Webster's Coronation Street wedding shocker, a horror accident in Emmerdale and a fire drama for one Hollyoaks family. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID);
